Subject: Welcoming Lara Tarawneh, Celebrating our Q2 2025 top Learners, Back to School/ Work Ready Tryano
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-2-min.png> 	

Welcoming Lara Tarawneh

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1782&user=10620> 	

Lara joins our Group as Manager of the Customer Care Team in Amman, reporting to Zeina Brosh. 
Lara brings a rich background in customer service, with extensive experience in building collaborative teams and streamlining support processes. With a degree in Italian Language and Literature, she combines her passion for language with a commitment to creating people-centered solutions. 
Lara is excited to embark on this new chapter and to grow alongside the team.


 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-1-min.png> 	

Celebrating Our Q2 2025 Top Learners!

chunks.text:
Lara joins our Group as Manager of the Customer Care Team in Amman, reporting to Zeina Brosh. 
Lara brings a rich background in customer service, with extensive experience in building collaborative teams and streamlining support processes. With a degree in Italian Language and Literature, she combines her passion for language with a commitment to creating people-centered solutions. 
Lara is excited to embark on this new chapter and to grow alongside the team.


 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-1-min.png> 	

Celebrating Our Q2 2025 Top Learners!

We are thrilled to spotlight the incredible commitment of our Q2 2025 Top Learners <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1783&user=10620>  who stood out by embracing continuous learning through our Learning Pathways! Their dedication sets a brilliant example across the Group.

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1784&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-3-min.png> 	

Back To School/ Work Ready With Tryano!


 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/60728c8224a6eb9306c858ccff1cc5662092113492.gif> 	

Step back into your work routine with effortless style. Ease into the season with polished, office-ready looks in sleek neutrals, paired with versatile carryalls that elevate any outfit.

For the little ones, head to our exclusive Sprayground pop-up for bold backpacks, discover smart-casual staples from Boss Kids, and explore personalized backpacks from My 1st Years.

Step back into your work routine with effortless style. Ease into the season with polished, office-ready looks in sleek neutrals, paired with versatile carryalls that elevate any outfit.

For the little ones, head to our exclusive Sprayground pop-up for bold backpacks, discover smart-casual staples from Boss Kids, and explore personalized backpacks from My 1st Years.

Enjoy in-store events and exclusive offers, only at Tryano, Yas Mall.
